personalInfo.name: Ahmed Hassanen
personalInfo.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
personalInfo.bio: I'm a passionate developer with a knack for creating beautiful, functional, and accessible web experiences. I love tackling complex problems and turning ideas into reality. This portfolio is a showcase of my journey in tech.

aboutme.description: Experienced Frontend Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in React, TypeScript, JavaScript (ES6+), Node.js, HTML5 & CSS3. Strong engineering professional with a Bachelor's degree focused in Computer Science from University of Technology.

experience.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
experience.description: Led the development of a new user-facing analytics dashboard using React and D3.js. Mentored junior developers and improved code quality across the team by implementing a new style guide.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained responsive websites for various clients using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Collaborated with designers to ensure pixel-perfect implementation of UIs.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Graduated with honors. Focused on software engineering and web development principles. Participated in the annual coding competition.

projects.name: Project Alpha
projects.description: A full-stack web application for project management, built with React and Node.js.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: This very portfolio, built to be easily configurable and deployable.
